column2: # Отбираем 70% данных на обучающую часть и 30% на валидацию

model <- glm(`Presence or absence of cardiovascular disease` ~ Age + Gender + Height + Weight + `Systolic blood pressure` + `Diastolic blood pressure` + Cholesterol + Glucose + Smoking + `Alcohol intake` + `Physical activity`,

glm(formula = `Presence or absence of cardiovascular disease` ~ 
    Age + Gender + Height + Weight + `Systolic blood pressure` + 
        `Diastolic blood pressure` + Cholesterol + Glucose + 
        Smoking + `Alcohol intake` + `Physical activity`, family = "binomial", 
    data = train_data)
Null deviance: 61932  on 44800  degrees of freedom
Residual deviance: 50677  on 44787  degrees of freedom
